title: POCUS (Point-of-Care Ultrasound) Practical Training Program for Low-Income Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: POCUS training utilizing smartphone-based VR simulations and offline practical materials

learning_goals: Learners can explain the basic imaging acquisition procedures for abdominal/chest/obstetrics and gynecology domains using POCUS equipment.
In resource-limited settings, learners can perform emergency patient assessment protocols using POCUS with 80% accuracy.
Using smartphone-based VR simulations, learners can reduce POCUS imaging interpretation errors by 50%.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
